span.div: Due to the State of Emergency declared by Governor Cuomo, Deposit CSD is closed from 3/16/2020 to 5/15/2020. Check this link and our FB page for regular updates.

span.strong: Due to the continued concerns with COVID-19,
New York State has closed all schools from

span.div: This page will keep parents, faculty and staff updated on information related to COVID-19 in our community.
The health and safety of our students and staff is the district’s highest priority, and we will remain vigilant in our efforts to help prevent the spread of any illnesses.

To ensure that all messages to our school community are accurate and as current as possible, all information regarding this constantly changing situation will come directly from the superintendent or other district leadership team members via emails, text alerts and School Messenger. All updates will be added to this web page as they become available.
There is a state hotline at 1-888-364-3065, where experts from the Department of Health can answer questions regarding the novel Coronavirus.
If you need to contact administration for any reason, please use the email addresses below:
Elementary Principal, Kelli Vosbury - mailto:[email protected]
MS Principal, Hal Pettersen - mailto:[email protected]
HS Principal, Karen Armbrust - mailto:[email protected]
Director of Special Education, Lauri Thomas-McCoy - mailto:[email protected]

div.strong: If you need assistance getting any resources within the community such as food, gas, health care or utilities, please contact Julia Wheeler, our Community Schools Coordinator, at
or 607-221-3977. Julia will work on your behalf to help you access what you need!

span.div: Click on the links below to read more on each update.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'Technology Assistance for Students and Families');
